THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY, NEW YORK 12224
DIVISION OF EDUCATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
LEE E. CAMPION, DIRECTOR
GR 4-5974
February 15, 1965
Mrs. Marion Corwell
Associate Director
School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Marion:
Dr. Bernarr Cooper and I had a very worthwhile meeting with Harold
Hill and Jim Fellows concerning a speakers guide. We decided to take
the following action:
1. An announcement is to be made in the NAEB News Letter
requesting members to nominate resource people. We
decided the guide should be for resource people rather
than just speakers. The nominator is to indicate the
topic areas which the resource person will advise.
2. NAEB, through its staff and the public relations committee,
shall select resource people from the nominations sent in.
3. Those selected will receive a detailed questionnaire gathering
vital information from the person nominated.
4. A meeting will be called to put together the publication.
This meeting will be called by NAEB.
5. The guide for resource personnel will then be published.
I am in the process now of drafting the News Letter announcement which
I will send to you and Harold Hill. Harold seemed satisfied that we are
moving in the right direction. I hope these steps will meet with your
approval.
Lee E. Campion
Director
